titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duties on ondansetron hydrochloride (bulk and dosage forms).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 11/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on 1,2,3,9-tetrahydro-9-methyl-3-((2-methyl-1H-imidazol-1-yl) methyl)-4H-carbazol-4-one hydrochloride dihydrate (ondansetron hydrochloride in bulk and dosage forms).
